/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The road itself is divided by a median, with trees lining both sides, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, creating a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
